title: 02/01/21 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 02/01/21 DPS Best OF
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, we kick off Super Bowl week with guest from around the NFL. Fresh off his prediction, Albert Breer joins us for the 2nd straight show to explain why he predicted Matt Stafford would get traded this week. The Dolphins Tua Tagovailoa reflects back on his rookie season and talks about the trade rumors. The LA Times Gary Klein discusses what surprised him most about the Stafford trade. And Kyler Murray joins us for the first time since his infamous appearance on Super Bowl week in Atlanta

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
